attributes.additional_details: Government to roll out a program of vaccinations for the entire population as quickly as possible working nights and weekends, using volunteers, pharmacies in addition to the village halls and doctors surgeries.
attributes.background: Carry out Vaccinations 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to get the population vaccinated as quickly as possible.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
